name: Examples of unconditional execution

sections.text:
;; Print numbers and their squares.
     ;; The DO construct applies to multiple forms.
      (loop for i from 1 to 3
            do (print i)
               (print (* i i)))
      |>  1
      |>  1
      |>  2
      |>  4
      |>  3
      |>  9
     =>  NIL
